snippet: Cynthia López, Mayor Bill de Blasio’s newly appointed film commissioner, brings to the job an unusual background in independent documentary films.
abstract: Profile of Cynthia Lopez, who has been appointed by New York Mayor Bill de Blasio as city's new film commissioner; Lopez says that she will pursue opportunities for independent filmmakers in city, even as she continues to court more lucrative Hollywood projects.
lead_paragraph: Cynthia López, Mayor Bill de Blasio’s newly appointed film commissioner, brings to the job an unusual background in independent documentary films.

headline.main: New York’s Film Czar Preserves Indie Spirit
headline.print_headline: New York’s Film Czar Preserves Indie Spirit

keywords.value: Mayor's Office of Media and Entertainment
